transcript: I mean you can tell me what why is no one hiring? Is it me? Be honest you can tell you know I can take it. I can take it. You just tell me why

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, You can tell me what.  Why is no one hiring me?  Is it me?  Be honest.  You can tell me. you know I can take it.  I can take it, you just tell me. Why?
